txt.en: 'As I said, I am sorry to intrude upon your reflection, but perhaps you can speak with Cardavor in Celondim proper? He seems quite worried about something, and, from what I know of the tales of your bravery, you may be able to help him.\n\n'You may find him by the piers, not far from here.'
'Ah, hello there. We have not had time to get acquainted. My name is Cardavor. And you are...?'
'Did you speak to Cardavor yet? He seemed worried about something.'
Prologue: At the Behest of Cardavor
You were greeted by an Elf-maiden as you paused for reflection in Celondim.
Cardavor waits for you by the piers north of where Eilian keeps watch. \n\nCardavor, an Elf of Celondim, needs assistance with some matter. Perhaps you should speak with him.
